articles.title: "Captagon", The Drug That Has Hooked The Gulf, Sparked Concerns In Europe - NDTV
articles.description: Europe is bracing for the possible influx of a drug that's hooked the Middle East as political shifts and crackdowns in the Gulf spur producers in Syria and Lebanon to tap new markets.
articles.content:
The expanding scope of the captagon trade is also alarming the US.
